alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 1:42PM CST until February 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be a lull in wintry weather Monday evening, but additional winter weather impacts are expected late overnight and into Tuesday as additional snow returns to the area. Please monitor the forecast for updates.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
